titleStmt.title: The Christians daily monitor to the performance of personal and relative duties With a resolution of some cases of conscience. Published for the benefit of young persons; By Joseph Church. Together with so much of Mr. Samuel Hierons catechisme, as concerns second table duties.
titleStmt.author: Church, Josiah.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, at the sign of the Bible upon London Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Sion College Library, London.

place.placeName: the sign of the Bible upon London Bridge
